title: Strengthening CS (Customer Service) Practical Competencies: Case-Based Learning for Improving General Chemistry Laboratory Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply chemical analysis processes to practical settings when writing case-based lab reports
Learners can analyze experimental data reliability and report quality with over 80% accuracy through peer assessment
Learners can interpret phosphate quantitative analysis results using a spectrophotometer with 95% confidence
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
